name: HardCoreEnemies

author: SGZ_Creations, TheXRify
description:
There Are 3 main Seetting that will allow to modify how this mod's functions works and they are:

DamageMultiplier,
ResistanceMultiplier,
CombatResistanceMultiplier.

Heavily recommend Decreasing the seettings equally
